shortdesc.ph: The video streams for local video mixing.

plentry.pd: The video source type for local video mixing. See .

pd.p: The user ID of the remote user.
pd.note: Use this parameter only when the source type is for local video mixing.

pd.p: The URL of the image.Use this parameter only when the source type is the image for local video mixing.

plentry.pd: (Optional) Media player ID. Use the parameter only when you set sourceType to .

plentry.props: cpp unreal bp android unity cs electron rn flutter
plentry.pd: The relative lateral displacement of the top left corner of the video for local video mixing to the origin (the top left corner of the canvas).

plentry.props: cpp unreal bp android unity cs electron rn flutter
plentry.pd: The relative longitudinal displacement of the top left corner of the captured video to the origin (the top left corner of the canvas).

plentry.props: cpp unreal bp android unity cs electron rn flutter
plentry.pd: The width (px) of the video for local video mixing on the canvas.

plentry.props: cpp unreal bp android unity cs electron rn flutter
plentry.pd: The height (px) of the video for local video mixing on the canvas.
The relative position and size of the video for local video mixing to the origin (the top left corner of the canvas). The data type is CGRect.

The number of the layer to which the video for the local video mixing belongs. The value range is [0, 100].
0: (Default) The layer is at the bottom.
100: The layer is at the top.
The transparency of the video for local video mixing. The value range is [0.0, 1.0]. 0.0 indicates that the video is completely transparent, and 1.0 indicates that it is opaque.

Whether to mirror the video for the local video mixing.
: Mirror the video for the local video mixing.
: (Default) Do not mirror the video for the local video mixing.
This parameter only takes effect on video source types that are cameras.
